bug.author: YanZhangADS
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
webcam widge does not show in 00_webcam.ipynb for object detection <denchmark-h:h3>In which platform does it happen?</denchmark-h>
Ubuntu DSVM NC6 Chrome/Firefox/Edge I use port forward to this DSVM from my laptop. My laptop has windows system. <denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the issue?</denchmark-h>
Nothing happens after executing cell: HBox([w_cam, w_imrecorder, w_im]) <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
the webcam widget should show in the notebook <denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: check if page as camera access: <denchmark-link:https://smartserve.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360012330533-How-do-I-check-my-browser-permissions-for-my-camera-and-microphone->https://smartserve.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360012330533-How-do-I-check-my-browser-permissions-for-my-camera-and-microphone-</denchmark-link>
Closing since we made changes a while back to make the widget rendering more stable
